name: CandyCat
description:
This is a prototype for a Platformer game using a boat load of GMS2 coding tutorials found across YouTube as well as looking at the manual.

This game is mainly inspired by Mario and was used to learn more about coding in GMS2 in the form as a smallish project.

It is recommended if you're playing for the first time to select the "How to play" option on the menu screen, you will be shown the controls.

All the sprites, art, sounds and music have been made by me.
